text: (Whose hearts fear when Allah is mentioned) when they are commanded with any command from Allah, (and the patient) and give good tidings to those who are patient that they will have Paradise (of whatever may befall them) of hardship and misfortune, (and those who establish worship) and give good tidings to those who perform the five daily prayers, perfecting their ablution, bowings, prostrations and all that which is obligated in their prescribed times (and who spend) in alms and in giving the poor-due (of that We have bestowed on them) of wealth.
